# flutter-codelitt-demo

![Framework](https://img.shields.io/badge/Framework-Flutter-blue.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-1.0-orange.svg?style=for-the-badge)

## Flutter demo: ##

* Project created with Android Studio 3.2.1, runs on iOS and Android.

* Uses Material design for the UI

* The maps functionality only works on Android cause iOS is paid.

* The mail functionality works on the android simulator and on both platform devices, 
  since the iOS simulator has that limitation.
